bugs.title: CVE-2017-9083 mingw-poppler: poppler: Null pointer dereference in the JPXStream::readUByte function [fedora-all]

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2017-9083 mingw-poppler: poppler: Null pointer dereference in the JPXStream::readUByte function [fedora-all]

blocked.short_desc: CVE-2017-9083 poppler: Null pointer dereference in the JPXStream::readUByte function

long_desc.thetext:
poppler 0.54.0, as used in Evince and other products, has a NULL pointer dereference in the JPXStream::readUByte function in JPXStream.cc. For example, the perf_test utility will crash (segmentation fault) when parsing an invalid PDF file.

Upstream bug:

https://bugs.freedesktop.org/show_bug.cgi?id=101084

Created mingw-poppler tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-all [bug 1453200]


Created poppler tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-all [bug 1453199]

Created evince tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-all [bug 1453201]

of fedora-all.

against the "Security Response" product referenced in the "Blocks" field.

NOTE: this issue affects multiple supported versions of Fedora. While only
one tracking bug has been filed, please correct all affected versions at
the same time.  If you need to fix the versions independent of each other,
you may clone this bug as appropriate.

bugs.title: CVE-2017-7511 mingw-poppler: poppler: Null pointer dereference in pdfunite via crafted documents [fedora-all]

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2017-7511 mingw-poppler: poppler: Null pointer dereference in pdfunite via crafted documents [fedora-all]

blocked.short_desc: CVE-2017-7511 poppler: Null pointer dereference in pdfunite via crafted documents

long_desc.thetext:
poppler since version 0.17.3 has been vulnerable to NULL pointer dereference in pdfunite triggered by specially crafted documents.

Upstream bugs:

https://bugs.freedesktop.org/show_bug.cgi?id=101149
https://bugs.freedesktop.org/show_bug.cgi?id=101153

Upstream patch:

https://cgit.freedesktop.org/poppler/poppler/commit/?id=5c9b08a875b07853be6c44e43ff5f7f059df666a

Created mingw-poppler tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-all [bug 1456829]


Created poppler tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-all [bug 1456828]
